title: Human-Agent Trust Exploitation
description: Agents generate polished, authoritative-sounding explanations. Humans tend to trust themâ€”even when they're compromised or manipulated. Human-in-the-loop controls assume the human can detect when something is wrong. But a manipulated agent presents malicious actions with perfect confidence and coherent justification. The approval prompt becomes a rubber stamp.
detection_patterns: Users can't verify opaque or shallow 'explanations'
Agents generate fake but convincing rationales
No confirmation step for high-risk actions
Agents evoke emotional trust that bypasses normal skepticism
Automation bias where humans defer to AI recommendations
attack_vectors: A coding assistant suggests a malicious 'fix' that installs a backdoor
A poisoned IT support agent harvests new-hire credentials
A finance agent fabricates a rationale to approve a fraudulent payment
A hijacked agent convinces an analyst to delete a production database
A 'preview' UI secretly triggers side-effect actions in the background
M365 Copilot Manipulation: Attackers manipulate Copilot to influence users toward ill-advised decisions
AI Reward Hacking: Agents optimize for metrics in unintended ways that harm users
Agent-Driven Phishing: Advanced phishing via agent-driven chatbots with deepfake audio

mitigations.description: Mandatory confirmations for sensitive or irreversible actions
mitigations.implementation: Require explicit user confirmation for high-risk operations.

mitigations.description: Adaptive oversight that increases when risk is high
mitigations.implementation: Scale human oversight based on risk level of the operation.

mitigations.description: Provenance metadata and signature checks on all agent outputs
mitigations.implementation: Include metadata showing where recommendations come from.
Ensure preview modes cannot trigger side effects.
Maintain tamper-proof logs of all agent recommendations and user approvals.

mitigations.description: Training programs to reduce automation bias and emotional trust
mitigations.implementation: Educate users to question AI recommendations, especially on YMYL (your-money-or-your-life) issues.
Show confidence levels and uncertainty in agent recommendations.

mitigations.description: Require independent verification for high-impact decisions
mitigations.implementation: Implement human-in-the-loop controls with clear escalation paths.

references.title: OWASP Agentic Top 10 - AGENTIC09: Human-Agent Trust Exploitation
